categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones actors
Category:Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith actors

nodes.text: Jay Laga'aia (born September 10, 1963) played Captain Typho in Attack of the Clones and Revenge of the Sith.
Because of Typho's eye patch, Jay Laga'aia often had difficulty hitting his marks on Attack of the Clones set due to poor depth perception.
Laga'aia was the Celebrity Host for the Sagamore Ballroom stage at Celebration III in 2005, and for the Concourse Ballroom stage at Celebration IV in 2007.
